about_the_game:
Do you like spending hours watching numbers grow bigger and bigger?
Or maybe you like games where you can just sit back, relax and let the game play itself for some time.
Well, CoinBlock Clicker is possibly the perfect game for you!
With many hours of content and dozens of features to enhance your clicking experience, you will never get bored.





The idle implementation of CoinBlock Clicker is unlike any other. Purchase many different idle games and let them collect coins for you.
Your idle coins will be delivered to your doorstep through our special tube network.
By upgrading the tubes, you can increase your idle income even further!





For completing simple tasks, you can get rewards and collect in game currencies.
There is even a daily quest that resets every 24 hours and is worth much more than those normal quests.





Become stronger and more powerful by unlocking the items in the special item shop.
Items are very important when you want to make those numbers grow rapidly.
Collecting items will trigger a small event that boosts your income for a short time or even clicks for you!
But the best part is that you can even upgrade your items! That will increase their strength even further.





After progressing to a specific point, you will notice that you can unlock a prestige world.
By doing so, you will prestige your current progress, and you will have to start all over again with nothing.
But it's worth it, all coins have an increased value that grows with each unlocked prestige world.
You also unlock new coins, minigames and tubes after each prestige.
That means for every prestige you unlock, there is more content for you to explore!

highlighted.name: Yes there is a third Coins Achievement

name: CoinBlock Clicker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100, AMD FX-4100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 950
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400, AMD Ryzen 7 2700X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: CoinBlock Clicker is an idle clicker with a unique way of merging idle and clicker fun into one game! You simply click thousands of times on the coinblock and make those coins fly all over your screen!
